TopicTitle: Which add-ons have inflatable heat shields?

Articles.Content:
I've been trying to locate some add-ons that provide various sizes of inflatable (ballute) heat shields. I'm specifically looking for something that looks similar to that which NASA tested recently. I have tried searching for them on the forum and elsewhere, but I can't seem to locate them. Any ideas?

They do not have to be compatible with Deadly Reentry as I don't use that if that helps any, and I'm using 0.25.

Thanks in advance for any help!
Deadly Reentry itself, but also the now-discontinued Klockheed Martian Special Parts.
Thank you for this, I wasn't clear on DR and I'll have a longer look at it and Klochheed as well!
